title: Red Hat Tries To Make Better OPEN NVIDIA Drivers
description:
If you wanted to use open source Nvidia drivers your only option for the longest time was Nouveau but a couple of Red Hat engineers are aiming to change that and build a new driver based on Rust and for GSP firmware GPUs called Nova
